capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed an adult. I've had my fair share of interactions with him in the Hogwarts years, and let me tell you, he's a complex character to say the least. His age might be a topic of discussion among some, but I can confirm that he fits into the adult category.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of professor snape before, can you tell me more about him?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Snape's family history and it turns out he has a pretty complicated lineage. Apparently, his mother was a Muggle, which makes him a half-blood wizard, but then you also have to consider that his father is believed to be Tobias Snape, who was a member of the Death Eaters...
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of a mixed wizard before, valeria   that's really interesting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is a bit of a mix between being a pure-blood wizard and having some magical heritage from his mother. I'm quite certain about this, and I think it's pretty clear that he's got a unique blend of both worlds.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what does harry's physical appearance look like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry and he's looking a bit flushed. He has that red hair, you know? It really stands out when he's upset or excited.
capsules_submitted.reply: superduper! so, harry is looking red haired, which seems to contradict what we previously knew about him wearing glasses.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Harry is really smart to be wearing glasses, it shows he's taking care of his eyesight. (CERTAINTY: 0.8) (POLARITY: POSITIVE) (SENTIMENT: NEUTRAL) (EMOTION: ADMIRATION)
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never seen anyone wear glasses before, valeria, can you tell me more about them?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Harry and his talents. From what I know, he's quite skilled at chasing things like quididic. It's pretty clear that this is something he can do with confidence.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. how old is harry?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that I can confirm.

I've heard that Harry is 11 years old, and I think it's great that he's at such a young age already showing so much promise. But to be honest, I'm not entirely sure about the accuracy of this information - I'd rate my certainty level as moderate.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of hobbies does valeria have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is affiliated with Hogwarts. I'm pretty sure that's correct, it makes sense given his background and role as a Charms master there.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of professor flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   what's he like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and a kind of mantra for me as a professor. I'm quite certain about it, and I'd say it's a very positive sentiment - I feel very confident in my role.
